SA15dhksparu:00001_0: pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā
SA15dhksparu:00001_1: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhksparu:00002_0: rūpa-śleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhksparu:00002_1: tasmāt prakṛti-bhinnānāṃ sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhksparu:00003_0: para-apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ so asan katham apekṣate
SA15dhksparu:00003_1: saṃś ca sarva-nirāśaṃso bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate
SA15dhksparu:00004_1: kaḥ sambandho anavasthā ca na sambandha-matis tathā
SA15dhksparu:00005_0: tau ca bhāvau tad-anyaś ca sarve te sva-ātmani sthitāḥ
SA15dhksparu:00005_1: ity amiśrāḥ svayaṃ bhāvās tān miśrayati kalpanā
SA15dhksparu:00007_1: prasiddhyati kathaṃ dviṣṭho adviṣṭhe sambandhatā katham
SA15dhksparu:00008_1: tadbhāve api tad-bhāvāt sambandho na eka-vṛttimān
SA15dhksparu:00009_0: yady apekṣya tayor ekam anyatra asau pravartate
SA15dhksparu:00009_1: upakārī hy apekṣyaḥ syāt kathaṃ ca upakaroty asan
SA15dhksparu:00011_0: dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho na ato anyat tasya lakṣaṇam
SA15dhksparu:00012_0: yoga-upādhī na tāv eva kāryakāraṇatā atra kim
SA15dhksparu:00012_1: bhedāc cen nanv ayaṃ śabdo niyoktāraṃ samāśritaḥ
SA15dhksparu:00013_1: apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhir janaḥ
SA15dhksparu:00016_0: bhāve bhāvini tad-bhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā
SA15dhksparu:00017_1: vikalpā darśayanty arthān mithyā-arthā ghaṭitān iva
SA15dhksparu:00018_0: bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kāryakāraṇatā api kā
SA15dhksparu:00018_1: bhāve hy anyasya viśliṣṭau śilaṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau
SA15dhksparu:00019_1: anyonya-anupakārāc ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhksparu:00020_0: janane api hi kāryasya kenacit samavāyinā
SA15dhksparu:00020_1: samavāyī tadā na asau na tato atiprasaṅgataḥ
SA15dhksparu:00021_0: tayor anupakāre api samavāye paratra vā
SA15dhksparu:00021_1: sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam
SA15dhksparu:00022_0: saṃyoga-janane api iṣṭau tataḥ saṃyoginau na tau
SA15dhksparu:00023_0: saṃyoga-ādy-āśraye yogyam ayogyaṃ tac ca jāyate
SA15dhksparu:00025_0: teṣu satsv api tasya iti sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
